:py:mod:`rbeis.spark`
=====================

.. py:module:: rbeis.spark

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   
   RBEIS implementation using PySpark
   
   .. warning::
   Development of the PySpark implementation of RBEIS is currently on hiatus and will not resume until it is greenlit by the ONS.


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   rbeis.spark.impute



.. py:function:: impute(*args)

   
   Not yet implemented; returns an ``Exception``.  See ``rbeis.spark`` documentation.
